title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to add breakpoints or marks in a Java editor using the left vertical ruler, the popup menu does not appear as expected.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Actual: The expected popup menu does not appear, preventing the user from adding breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear to add breakpoints, marks, etc. However, the menu does not appear. This issue needs to be resolved so that the popup menu functions correctly.
